missingFiscalYears.description: The journal entries in this file require fiscal years that don't exist in your system yet.

recurringInvoices.title: Recurring Invoices
recurringInvoices.description: Set up automatic invoice schedules for subscription billing

recurringInvoices.confirmDeleteDescription: This will permanently delete this recurring invoice schedule. Generated invoices will not be affected.

banner.title: We value your privacy
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can change these settings at any time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They enable core functionality such as authentication, security, and session management.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve user experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites and display relevant advertisements. They may also be used to measure advertising campaign effectiveness.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies remember your preferences such as language, region, and display settings to provide a more personalized experience.

policy.title: Cookie Policy
policy.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
policy.howWeUseCookiesText: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, remember your preferences, understand how you use our services, and analyze site performance.
policy.manageCookiesText: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by visiting the Cookie Settings page. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website.

notifications.preferencesSaved: Your cookie preferences have been saved
notifications.preferencesError: Failed to save cookie preferences. Please try again.

balanceSheet.title: Balance Sheet
balanceSheet.description: Generate balance sheet following Swedish ÅRL standard
balanceSheet.notBalancedWarning: Warning: Balance sheet is not balanced
balanceSheet.selectDateToGenerate: Select a date to generate balance sheet

incomeStatement.title: Income Statement
incomeStatement.description: Generate income statement following Swedish ÅRL standard
incomeStatement.selectPeriodToGenerate: Select a period to generate income statement

vatReport.title: VAT Report
vatReport.description: Generate VAT report for Skatteverket filing (Momsrapport)
vatReport.payableNote: This amount should be paid to Skatteverket by the filing deadline.
vatReport.receivableNote: This amount can be claimed back from Skatteverket.
vatReport.filingNote: This report is formatted according to Swedish Skatteverket requirements. Please verify all figures before submitting your VAT return.
vatReport.noData: No VAT data available for the selected period
vatReport.vatPayableNote: This amount should be paid to Skatteverket by the filing deadline.
vatReport.vatReceivableNote: This amount can be claimed back from Skatteverket.
